document.full_text: steven stamkos, simon gagne and pavel kubina each scored a pair of goals to power the tampa bay lightning to an 8-2 rout of the pittsburgh penguins on saturday and keep alive their first round playoff series.
document.title: lightning flash their scoring touch to rout penguins
lines_and_colors: steven stamkos, simon gagne and pavel kubina each scored a pair of goals to power the tampa bay lightning to an 8-2 rout of the pittsburgh penguins on saturday and keep alive their first round playoff series.
